Name: Sweet Asia
Review Text: The  my sushi was warm bc they put it in the same bag as the hot items. Warm, raw tuna, gross. The veggie roll had a huge chunk of avocado (see pic). It didnt taste right either, no flavor. I spent $25 and couldnt eat Maybe their other dishes are better? Staff was neutral. Good luck

Review Text: Get sushi from here often. Sushi is good and reasonably priced. Fried rice and wantons are also quite good, which are the other regulars. Ordering on Friday and Saturday evening can sometimes lead to long wait times, especially if you have it delivered.
